name: R.E. Huff 'n Stuff (NaNoReno 2022)
description:
They say that infinite monkeys at infinite typewriters will produce all the greatest works of literature. This is not that. Not even close.

This is what happens when you get a bunch of half-baked (or in some cases, fully baked) podcasters together to create a visual novel. Well, we created something. What it is, we don't know. But we're willing to test it out on you. For Science.
